# HKWorkoutActivityType.transition

**Case**

A constant for the transition time between activities in a multisport workout.

## Declaration

```swift
case transition
```

## Discussion

Use this constant to create an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutActivity] instance that represents the transition between sports in a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutActivityType/swimBikeRun] workout.

## Multisport activities

- **HKWorkoutActivityType.swimBikeRun**: The constant for multisport activities like triathlons.
